scenario.name: SIP_INVITE_with_CANCEL
scenario.send:
INVITE urn:service:sos SIP/2.0 Via: SIP/2.0/[transport] [local_ip]:[local_port] From: "NG911 Test" <sip:+12025551212@[local_ip]:[local_port]>;tag=[call_number] To: urn:service:sos Call-ID: [call_id] Cseq: 1 INVITE Contact: sip:SENDER@[local_ip]:[local_port] Max-Forwards: 70 Content-Type: application/sdp Content-Length: [len] Call-Info: urn:emergency:uid:callid:123ABCdefg123ABCdefg123ABCdefg12:test.com Call-Info: urn:emergency:uid:incidentid:123ABCdefg123ABCdefg123ABCdefg12:test.com Resource-Priority: esnet.1
v=0 o=user1 53655765 2353687637 IN IP[local_ip_type] [local_ip] s=- t=0 0 c=IN IP[media_ip_type] [media_ip] m=audio [media_port] RTP/AVP 0 a=rtpmap:0 PCMU/8000

CANCEL urn:service:sos SIP/2.0 Via: SIP/2.0/[transport] [local_ip]:[local_port] From: "NG911 Test" <sip:+12025551212@[local_ip]:[local_port]>;tag=[call_number] To: urn:service:sos Call-ID: [call_id] Cseq: 1 CANCEL Max-Forwards: 70 Content-Length: [len]
